```{r setup}
library(GitStats)
library(magrittr)
git_stats <- create_gitstats() %>%
  set_connection(
    api_url = "https://api.github.com",
    token = Sys.getenv("GITHUB_PAT"),
    orgs = c("openpharma", "r-world-devs")
  ) %>%
  set_connection(
    api_url = "https://gitlab.com/api/v4",
    token = Sys.getenv("GITLAB_PAT"),
    orgs = c("erasmusmc-public-health")
  )
```

```{r}
get_repos(git_stats,
          by = "phrase",
          phrase = "covid",
          language = "R") %>% 
  plot_repos()
```
